decks.name: Quests

cards.title: Example: The Village Elder's Request
cards.content:
### Quest Overview
The elder of Oakhaven asks the player to retrieve a lost family heirloom from the nearby goblin caves.

#### Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Player can accept the quest from the Elder.
- [ ] Quest is added to the player's journal.
- [ ] Goblin cave location is marked on the map.
- [ ] Heirloom is placed in the final chest of the cave.
- [ ] Player can return the heirloom to the Elder for a reward.

This quest should introduce the player to the basic combat loop. See $GoblinEnemy.
